user_query: I am planning a surprise date for my partner and I want to take them to a romantic brewery in San Diego. Can you recommend a brewery with a cozy ambiance and candlelit seating? Furthermore, provide me with the details of a nearby place to visit after the brewery tour.

TaskList.description: Search for romantic breweries in San Diego with cozy ambiance and candlelit seating.
Select the top recommended brewery to visit based on the search results.
Find a nearby place to visit after the brewery tour, considering romantic settings.
Compile and present the suggested brewery and nearby attraction to the user.
